channel.description: Recent content in Proteomics on CityU-Bioinformatics

item.title: Immune System
item.description: Table of Contents Immune System Analysis Sequence-based B-cell Epitope Prediction ABCpred BepiPred Structure-based B-cell Epitope Prediction LYRA MHC Class I Epitope Prediction ProPred1 GradDock MHC Class II Epitope Prediction HLAMatchmaker ProPred Flow Cytometry Cell Population Identification FCS Express FlowJo Mass Cytometry SPADE (Spanning tree Progression of Density normalized Events viSNE | Data visualization : Flow cytometry Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Immune System Analysis Immunoinformatics involves the application of computational methods to immunological problems.

item.title: Membrane Protein
item.description: Table of Contents Membrane Protein Analysis Membrane Simulation CHARMM-GUI Membrane Builder | Membrane simulation : Membrane protein analysis Transmembrane Beta-barrel Prediction PROFtmb | Transmembrane beta-barrel prediction : Membrane protein analysis PRED-TMBB | Transmembrane beta-barrel prediction : Membrane protein analysis Transmembrane Helix Prediction CCTOP | Consensus Constrained TOPology prediction SignalP FRAP easy-FRAP | FRAP : Laser scanning microscopy PyFRAP | Python Fluorescence Recovery After Photobleaching Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Membrane Protein Analysis Membrane and transmembrane proteins are key component of cell signaling.

item.title: Prediction of Protein Structure
item.description: Table of Contents Primary structure ProtParam COILS Secondary structure PredictProtein PSIPRED tertiary structure Phyre Swiss-PdbViewer Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Primary structure Protein primary structure is the linear sequence of amino acids in a peptide or protein. By convention, the primary structure of a protein is reported starting from the amino-terminal (N) end to the carboxyl-terminal © end. Protein biosynthesis is most commonly performed by ribosomes in cells.

item.title: Protein Interactions
item.description: Table of Contents Protein Interactions Analysis Protein-DNA Interaction Prediction LigParGen | Protein-ligand docking : Protein interaction analysis DBSI | DNA Binding Site Identifier Protein-RNA Interaction Prediction HADDOCK | High Ambiguity Driven protein-protein DOCKing Global Score | Protein-RNA interactions Drug-target Interaction Prediction Open Targets | Drug-target interaction prediction : Protein interaction analysis PiHelper | Drug-target interaction prediction : Protein interaction analysis Protein-protein Interaction Prediction mentha | Protein-protein interaction prediction : Protein interaction analysis compPASS | comparative proteomic analysis software suite Protein-ligand Docking UCSF Chimera Protein-protein Docking PIPER | Protein-protein docking : Protein interaction analysis HADDOCK | High Ambiguity Driven protein-protein DOCKing Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Protein Interactions Analysis Proteins interact with nucleic acids, other proteins, ligands, metal ions, to exert their biological functions.

item.title: Protein Sequence/Expression
item.description: Table of Contents Protein Sequence Analysis Amino Acid Repeat Prediction RADAR REPRO Subcellular Localizaton Prediction TargetP pRoloc Protein Clustering CD-HIT USEARCH MS-based (Mass Spectrometry) untargeted Proteomics 2D gel Image Analysis digeR Plasmo2D In Silico Analysis OpenMS multiplierz Phosphorylation Site Assignment Ascore Phosphonormalizer PTM Identification PIQED SUMmOn Glycosylation Identification SugarQb MAGIC MS-based Metaproteomics Unipept MPA Antibody Array Analysis PANDA Find more tools: OMICTOOLS Protein Sequence Analysis Protein sequence analysis tools are used to predict specific functions, activities, origin, or localization of proteins based on their amino-acid sequence.
